channel.title: Prerequisites :: My Hugo Site
channel.description: Preparation Requirements A registered domain name (e.g. sgutodolist.com) With AWS Free Tier accounts, Route 53 domain registration is not supported. Therefore, in this project, the domain is registered with a third-party domain provider and then hosted on Amazon Route 53. An AWS account A successfully built ReactJS project AWS CLI (optional, for testing and validation) Node.js and npm installed on the local machine Required Knowledge Basic understanding of Amazon S3, CloudFront, and Route 53
